Thy delight in him and the place he holds with thee, your delight in him and the place he holds with you
| and I have no news to write it has come (?) to us and to me (?) while I have no news to write
to thee, and if we get any news I will write to you, and if we get any news I will write
it to thee speedily, if God wills. Wheat is with us it to you speedily, if God will. Wheat is with us
eight waibahs and a half and barley three ardebs. eight waibas (= 1 1/3 artaba) and a half (per dirham) and barley three artabas (per dirham)
And the cultivators have put their hands and the tenants have put their hands
on the crops in the Delta, on the crops in the lower part of the country,
and the (local) finance directors have entered (the contracts of lease) for them in the registers. And my daughter and the officials of the districts have registered for them. And my daughter
has already cohabited with her husband has cohabited with her husband
I had already written the letter the day before (intending) to dispatch it, when we learned Now I had written the letter the day before intending to send it when we learned
that Ḥuwayy b. Ḥuwayy had been appointed minister of prayer and kharaj: that Ḥuwayy ibn Ḥuwayy had been appointed governor of prayer and impost
and Ibn Malîḥ has just been appointed minister of control and impost, and Abû ʿUbaida now Ibn Malīḥ was appointed minister of control and kharaj and Abu ʿUbaidah
b. ʿUqbah b. Nāfiʿ of prayer and kharaj. And Ḥuwayy has written his letter ibn ʿUqba ibn Nâfiʿ of prayer and impost. And Ḥuwayy has written his letter
to the local finance directors summoning them from the two ʿIrâqs. I should like to inform thee thereof to the officials bidding them be brought from the two Iraqs. I have thought proper to inform you of this
that you might be aware of it. His appointment was only confirmed on Saturday that you mightest be aware of it. His appointment was only confirmed on Sunday,
the third of Ramaḍan. We have nothing more after this to write when three nights had passed of Ramaḍân. We have nothing more after this to write
to thee, while the water-wheels have already been transferred. to you. And the tabuts have been transferred
